name: xml-to-json
title: XML to JSON Converter
description: Transform XML documents into JSON format with pretty formatting
content:
Overview

This application converts XML documents into JSON format. Built using xmltodict, it preserves the structure and hierarchy of your XML data while transforming it into a more web-friendly JSON format.

Features

  • Convert XML to JSON format
  • Pretty-printed JSON output for readability
  • Preserves XML structure and attributes
  • UTF-8 encoding support

Parameters

  • XML File: Upload your XML file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a JSON file with the same base name as the input XML file in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Converting configuration files to JSON
  • Transforming API responses between formats
  • Preparing XML data for web applications
  • Data migration and format standardization
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/xml_to_json.py" "${xmlPath}" -o "${outputDir}"
